name: Quest For Followers
description:
My submission for the Black Humor Game Jam 2018.

This is also my first game jam participation ever.

Move around with W S A & D. Recruit followers with Space. Escape to exit.

Recruit followers! The time of ascension is close at hand. Recruit faster with more followers, and recruiting gives you extra time.

Music by Brett LeBlanc

Extra textures by: Joe Guerin, Wagner Forest, & Robert Lagroome
